4.8. xmlrunner¶

4.8.1. Module d1_common.xmlrunner¶

SOURCE:

http://xbmc.ramfelt.se/browser/TV.com/trunk/src/python-test/xmlrunner.py
Date Retrieved:

2010-06-15
Author:

Sebastian Rittau <srittau@jroger.in-berlin.de>
License:

Placed in the Public Domain.
Dependencies:
  • python 2.6

XML Test Runner for PyUnit.

Functions

escape(data[, entities]) Escape &, <, and > in a string of data.

Classes

XmlTestRunner([stream]) A test runner that stores results in XML format compatible with JUnit.
XmlTestRunnerTest([methodName])
